name: dinnerware
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
objects, especially plates and bowls of different sizes, used for serving and eating food: Plates and other dinnerware are presented in a beautiful painted cabinet. They sell an 18 piece white porcelain dinnerware set. Synonym
dishwareCompare
cookware
flatware
glassware
silverware
tableware
More examplesFewer examplesThe restaurant uses an eclectic patchwork of antique saucers and silverware, alongside gorgeous dinnerware handcrafted by local artisans.Why not buy a wooden plate rack to organize your dinnerware in your kitchen?Most bone china dinnerware is microwave safe and dishwasher safe.The Korean meals are served on traditional Korean dinnerware.Try their collection of glass dinnerware in amethyst and ruby red.
